lead_paragraph: UPPER MONTCLAIR, N.J. - The moment Juan Agudelo had been waiting for all his young life came Saturday night when he became the first player from the Red Bulls academy to start a game for the senior team in M.L.S.
snippet: The moment Juan Agudelo had been waiting for all his young life came Saturday night when he became the first player from the Red Bulls academy to start a game in M.L.S. for the senior team.

headline.main: Fresh-Faced Agudelo Has the Red Bulls Smiling

abstract: The moment Juan Agudelo had been waiting for all his young life came Saturday night when he became the first player from the Red Bulls academy to start a game in M.L.S. for the senior team.
